content: Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users. These settings will be effective for all of your portals.

comment.text: Use this option to customize your portal's on-brand mobile settings experience. This text is used as a subtitle in a category section, providing context for users navigating to LDAP settings on their mobile devices.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'on-brand experience' is not accurately conveyed by 'brendə xas təcrübə'. A more accurate translation might be something like 'brendlə uyğun təcrübə' or 'brendin özünəməxsus təcrübəsi'.

'These settings will be effective for all of your portals' is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani might be 'Bu parametrlər bütün portallarınızda tətbiq olunacaq' or 'Bütün portallarınız bu parametrlərə əsasən işləyəcək'.

The phrase "ຕາມທິດທາງຂອງຍີ່ຫໍ້" (tam thit thang khong yi ho) translates to "according to the direction of your brand" which isn't the most natural or accurate translation of "on-brand experience". A more suitable translation would be something like "ຕາມຮູບແບບຂອງຍີ່ຫໍ້" (tam roop map khong yi ho) which means "according to the brand's style/format".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກນີ້ເພື່ອໃຫ້ບໍລິການຕາມຮູບແບບຂອງຍີ່ຫໍ້ຂອງເຈົ້າ ໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຂອງເຈົ້າ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure "ໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກນີ້ເພື່ອໃຫ້ບໍລິການ...ໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຂອງເຈົ້າ" feels a bit clunky in Lao. It could be smoother.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກນີ້ເພື່ອໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຂອງເຈົ້າໄດ້ຮັບປະສົບການຕາມຮູບແບບຂອງຍີ່ຫໍ້ຂອງເຈົ້າ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'portalen' is a misspelling of 'portalen'.

The phrase "pokazywać użytkownikom branding marki" is an awkward and not idiomatic translation of "provide on-brand experience to your users."  'Branding marki' is too literal and doesn't convey the meaning of consistent branding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Użyj tej opcji, aby zapewnić użytkownikom spójny wizerunek marki.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "zostaną zastosowane" is grammatically correct, a more natural phrasing for this context would be something like 'będą obowiązywać'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Użyj tej opcji, aby zapewnić użytkownikom spójny wizerunek marki. Ustawienia te będą obowiązywać na wszystkich Twoich portalach.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "creştere a implicării" is not a direct or accurate translation of "on-brand experience." "On-brand experience" implies consistency and adherence to a brand's visual and messaging guidelines, which 'creştere a implicării' (growth of engagement) doesn't fully convey.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizați această opțiune pentru a oferi utilizatorilor dvs. o experiență în concordanță cu imaginea mărcii. (Use this option to provide your users with an experience consistent with your brand's image.) Or, Utilizați această opțiune pentru a oferi utilizatorilor dvs. o experiență conformă cu identitatea mărcii voastre.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a missing space after the colon in 'Ldap:LdapMobileSettingsDescription'. While not a critical error, consistency is important.

The translation 'продемонстрировать пользователям ваш бренд' (demonstrate your brand to users) is not as natural or idiomatic as a more user-focused phrasing. 'Provide on-brand experience' implies a benefit to the user, which is not conveyed by 'demonstrate your brand'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Используйте эту опцию, чтобы предоставить вашим пользователям опыт, соответствующий вашему бренду.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආභරණීය' (aabharanaya) translates to 'ornate' or 'jeweled' which doesn't accurately convey 'on-brand experience'. It's too literal and doesn't fit the context of user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrase like 'සමරු කළ' (samaru kala) which means 'branded' or 'consistent with the brand'.  A better translation might be: 'ඔබේ පරිශීලකයින් සඳහා ඔබේ බ්‍රෑන්ඩ් සමරු කළ අත්දැකීමක් ලබා දීමට මෙම විකල්පය භාවිතා කරන්න.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'අ සියලුම ද්වාර' (ama siuma dwaara) translates to 'all your gates/doors' which is a poor translation of 'all your portals'.  'Portals' should be translated more accurately.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use a phrase like 'සියළුම වෙබ් පිටි' (siyalum web piti) or 'ඔබේ සියලුම වේබ් අඩවි' (obey siyum waeb adavi), which better convey the meaning of 'portals'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'on-brand' is directly translated to 'on-brandového'. While understandable, it's not the most natural Slovak phrasing.  A better alternative would convey the meaning of 'consistent with the brand'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Použite túto možnosť na poskytnutie zážitku v súlade s vašou značkou pre vašich používateľov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ц́е бити примењена' sounds slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће бити важећи за све ваше портале

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "on-brand experience" is not directly equivalent to "u skladu sa brendom." While understandable, a more accurate translation could convey the intention of aligning with brand guidelines or maintaining a consistent brand identity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite ovu opciju da svojim korisnicima pružite iskustvo u skladu sa smernicama brenda / da obezbedite doslednost sa Vašim brendom.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ć' (ć) uses a diacritical mark. While technically correct, its consistency with other Serbian translations might require review. It could be a simple 'c' in other contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider reviewing the use of 'ć' across all translations to maintain consistency. Possibly use 'c' if that aligns with the overall style.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "trải nghiệm với thương hiệu" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "on-brand experience." It literally translates to 'experience with brand' which is clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng tùy chọn này để cung cấp trải nghiệm mang thương hiệu hoặc trải nghiệm phù hợp với thương hiệu cho người dùng của bạn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '为您的用户提供品牌体验' (provide brand experience to your users) doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'on-brand experience'. It's a more literal translation rather than conveying the intended meaning of aligning the user experience with the brand's identity and style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑使用更准确地表达品牌体验的说法，例如“为您用户打造符合品牌形象的体验” 或 “为您用户提供与品牌一致的体验”。
